definition: saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor

sentences.english: It is based upon the teachings of the ancient Chinese sage, Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 是中国古代的孔圣人的理论。

sentences.english: According to the story, Lao-tzu, the older of the two sages, thought very little of Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 据说，两位圣人中那位年长的老于很瞧不起孔子。

sentences.english: See Purple east of West Main, known to have saints coming.
sentences.chinese: 见东方有紫气西迈，知有圣人将至。

sentences.english: Simeon's this holy man living in the temple, again there's that theme of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 西面是住在圣殿中的圣人，这里又再次提到了圣殿。

sentences.english: The use of Catholic saints also bespeaks a syncretism of beliefs, he notes.
sentences.chinese: 就连天主教圣人也预言到了这种信仰融合。

sentences.english: Congratulations, you’re obviously a saint and can stop reading now.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜你，你显然是个圣人，现在可以不读这篇文章了。

sentences.english: The "crèche" is filled with clay or wood figures called "santons".
sentences.chinese: 那就是用泥土和木头做成的穆斯林圣人。

sentences.english: When you give food to the poor, they call you a saint.
sentences.chinese: 当你给穷人食物时，他们管你叫圣人。

sentences.english: A little body often harbours a great soul.
sentences.chinese: 莫道身躯小，圣人寓其间。

sentences.english: China worships him almost as a saint.
Confucius as a saint, Confucius was in a word of his life track.
sentences.chinese: 孔子为圣人，孔子用一句话概括了自己的人生轨迹。

sentences.english: The poets and "saints" of medieval bhakti appeared throughout India.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪的巴克提诗人和“圣人”遍布了印度。

sentences.english: Confucian promotes a sense of anxiety, directly related to their personality saints.
sentences.chinese: 这与其所标举的圣人人格是直接相关的。

sentences.english: MacArthur Ob/Gyn uses software developed by Sage Healthcare.
sentences.chinese: 麦克阿瑟妇产医院使用圣人保健公司研发的软件。

sentences.english: And the humanity theory of either goodness or wickedness emphasized the necessity of humanizing populace by sage.
sentences.chinese: 同时可善可恶的人性论强调了圣人教化民众的必要性。

sentences.english: In others she is regarded almost as saintly and miracles are attributed to her.
sentences.chinese: 另一版本甚至说她被尊为圣人，并且被认为是显圣。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
Second Sage, traditional title of Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] in Confucian studies
great person of the past/venerable forebear/the great and the good
Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
